body: Firstly, you can easily update your Docker, just run “pip install deeplabcut==2.1.3” perhaps do that first and report back is it still happens.

After exiting Docker, I did: (1) pip install deeplabcut==2.1.3 ::> all requirements satisfied; (2) in my DLCut environment (Anaconda) changed directory do Docker4DeepLabCut2.0 folderç (3) executed Docker (docker exec --user $USER -it rod_GPU0 /bin/bash); ...etc (below). Still did not work.


Don’t exit the Docker to update! Please update inside the Docker. 

Ie at this point: `rodrigo@561154058f28:/home$ ` run `pip install deeplabcut==2.1.3` start ipython, import deeplabcut and check version: `deeplabcut.__version__`

Also, please format your output as “code” click on the < > icon to format as code. See my edits to your post above. It’s very hard to read otherwise.

Sure! Did it.
